name: Internal Lining - Ceilings
Details
All preline services & passive fire (where required) completed, area accessible and substrate acceptable
Bracing, adhesive/sealant & lining layer(s) requirements achieved
Services/penetrations, correctly formed & located
Correct fixing pattern/sealant/adhesive/layers installed to align with consented design and specifications
Any bracing elements completed to design specification
All lining(s) completed correctly to specification & level of finish acceptable in respective area(s)
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
Internal Lining - Walls
Details
All preline services & passive fire (where required) completed, area accessible and substrate acceptable
Bracing, adhesive/sealant & lining layer(s) requirements achieved
Specific products used (photos Required)
Services/penetrations, correctly formed & located
Correct fixing pattern/sealant/adhesive/layers installed to align with consented design and specifications
Any bracing elements completed to design specification
All lining(s) completed correctly to specification & level of finish acceptable in respective area(s)
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
Stopping
Details
Complete fire stopping between layers of lining & apply compound(s) as specified
Openings/penetrations/corners & bulkheads, correctly formed
Square stopping, slimlines, joints checked & acceptable
Correct compound(s) used to align with consented specifications
Adequate drying time between coats, no visible bubbling/deforms & each coat is sanded as applicable
Light check completed to ensure no sheet joins stand out
Stopping work completed - specified level of finish achieved
Inspections completed and issued to Foreman
CLICK AND SEND EMAIL TO FOREMAN TO SIGN FOR RECEIPT OF THE INSPECTION RESULTS
